title: Calendar
description: Use the calendar to plan your days. Show jobs, job tasks and other events on the calendar from the system.

config.calendar_show_jobs: When 'calendar_show_jobs' is set to 1 the overall 'job' will show in the calendar based on the due date.
config.calendar_show_job_tasks: When 'calendar_show_job_tasks' is set to 1 the individual 'job tasks' will show in the calendar based on the individual job task due dates.
